mapper.sql: Select s.id as stand_id, s.price as stand_price, r.id as room_id, r.name as room_name, r.surface as room_surface, r.capacity as room_capacity, r.status as room_status, c.id as client_id, c.cuit as client_cuit, c.business_name as client_business_name, c.address as client_address, c.phone as client_phone, c.email as client_email, ev.id as event_id, ev.name as event_name, ev.theme as event_theme, ev.base_ticket_price as event_base_ticket_price, ev.start_date as event_start_date, ev.end_date as event_end_date, ev.address as event_address, ev.description as event_description, e.id as employee_id, e.first_name as employee_first_name, e.last_name as employee_last_name, e.address as employee_address, e.phone as employee_phone, e.email as employee_email, e.salary as employee_salary from stand s left join room r on s.room_id = s.id left join client c on s.client_id = c.id left join event ev on r.event_id = ev.id left join event_employee ee on ee.event_id = ev.id left join employee e on ee.employee_id = e.id
